div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 810 Razdjal, c. 15 km. S of Silistra, Bul- garia, 1958 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 1 AV, 161 AR. Pot hoard Philip II: 1 st. (Pella) Istrus: 161 dr. Disposition: private coll., Sumen Gerasimov, BIAB 25 (1962), p. 228; SCN 5 (1971), pp. 17-9
